Title: Underworld Awakening
Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Sci-Fi
Writer: Len Wiseman (screenplay), John Hlavin (screenplay), J. Michael Straczynski (screenplay), Allison Burnett (screenplay), Len Wiseman (story), John Hlavin (story), Kevin Grevioux (characters), Len Wiseman (characters), Danny McBride (characters)
Actors: Kate Beckinsale, Stephen Rea, Michael Ealy, Theo James
Plot: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.
